
{{Server client function}}
This function returns a [[/table.md|table]] containing network usage information about inbound and outbound packets.

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
table getNetworkUsageData ( )
</syntaxhighlight>

===Returns===
Returns a [[/table.md|table]] with two fields: "in" and "out". Each of these contain a table with two fields: "bits" and "count". Each of these contain a table with 256 numeric fields ranging from 0 to 255, containing the appropriate network usage data for such packet id.

==Example==
This example adds command ''nd'' that shows info about all inbound packets with bits bigger than zero.
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
addCommandHandler("nd",
	function ()
		local networkData = getNetworkUsageData()["in"]
		for i, val in pairs(networkData["count"]) do
			if networkData["bits"][i] > 0 then
				outputChatBox("ID: " .. i .. ": " .. val .. " - " .. networkData["bits"][i] .. "b")
			end
		end
end)
</syntaxhighlight>
